channel.title: Eclipse 639 BETA - Now ECONOMY BASED!
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Hello and welcome to the wonderful world of Eclipse 639! Some of you may know me as Clawed u 0ut/Eclipse on R-S. We have only recently moved to this BETA Deob but have already made quite a few changes to the server!
[COLOR=Red]We are now an Economy Based Server! Players will have to train all their skills manually and earn cash! Remember, the best way to make money is Crafting! The following are some of the current/upcoming features to look forward to:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Lime]Bossing for valuable Weapons/Armour/Items All skills being fully trainable with custom area's for skilling and combat training Full custom quests will be added for requirements for certain items Unlocking music tracks by traveling through the world and questing etc. Custom DICING ARENA!! (Huge Work In Progress)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Blue]Expect to be seeing new updates every day! Over the next week our team will be working hard to add wonderful unseen features to the server to make it as unique and original as possible! (This includes a never before seen custom minigame!)[/COLOR]
[b][size=12pt][u]Application Process:[/u][/size]
[b][color=purple][size=10pt]We Currently Have 3 Fields Needing Coverage. They are posted below along with the amount of people needed in quotes.
Coder/Developer "2" Website Design (HTML [1+ Years EXPERIENCE REQUIRED], CSS, PHP Experience Recommended) "1-2" Hoster (NOT NECCESSARY BUT IT'S A FREE ADMIN SPOT) "1"[/size][/b]
Currently Filled Positions: Coder/Developer: Eclipse - [1/3] Website Design: [0/2] Hoster: - [0/1]
Application Format:
[code]Name: Staff Account Name (If Accepted): Coding Experience: Position Applying For: Tell me about yourself (RSPS Related): Do you know any other coding languages? e.g. C++, Python, etc: Msn: Skype: Email: Available Work Hours:[/code]
Features Key: Complete In Progress Unstarted
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u] Perfect Clipped Following SOULWARS! Clan Wars Bork Minigame (Custom) New Original Home Unseen In Other Servers Starting Area Fixed Drops Full Godwars Banking Dupe/Glitch Fixed Beast Of Burden Banking Economy Better Combat System Full Magic, Range, Melee New Pk Area's Added Bank Tabs (8/30/11) Firemaking Fletching Crafting Woodcutting Thieving Fishing Cooking Summoning Herblore
[color=green][b][center][img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100704154903/runescape/images/e/ef/CombatSwords.PNG[/img]Melee 99.9% Perfect weapon timers. Correct max-hit formula. Every weapon’s special attack perfected. Equipment requirements. Proper animations for every weapon. Weapon poison can be used on every poison-able weapon. Poisoning deals damage overtime unless healed with pot. [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091219211543/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img]Magic Perfect Modern magics with Autocasting. Perfect Ancient Magiks with Autocasting. Perfect Lunar magics. Perfect Alch, Enchant, and Charge. Slayer spell and God spells work. Freezing and Stat drain spells all have proper effects. [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205042556/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img]Range Projectiles (Obsidian rings, darts, thrown-axe) all work. All Bows (Including Crystal Bow, Seercull, etc.) function properly. All Crossbow’s with proper effects. Every bow special attack with proper effects. Poisoned Arrows and Throwing weapons function perfectly. Crystal, magic bows ect not firing any type of bolt. [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img]Prayer Bone Burying. Dragon bones only at the moment. Plan to add full Prayer shop soon!. Bones on Alter for 2x EXP. Smite reduces opponents prayer by 25% of your damage. All prayers Function Perfectly (YES This means protect item aswell!) All other prayers (including Turmoil) work perfect. [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img]Fishing All Fish may be caught in the correct area with the correct equipment. (45% DONE) Small/Big Nets fully functional. (DONE) Harpoon fully functional. (DONE) Lobster Pot fully functional. (DONE) Level affects what you catch and the rate at which it is caught. (65% DONE) Perfect Fishing Guild for advanced Fisherman. (Unstarted) Correct fishing spot requirements. (50% Done) [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img]Woodcutting Trees now turn to stumps after all the logs have been cut. The number of logs a tree holds is determined randomly from an array of reasonable amount values. Bird Nests now fall from trees and can be searched for valuable seeds and jewelery. Tree respawns vary based on the tree’s output value. Every tree type choppable with proper log output and level requirements. Correct axe level requirements. [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img]Fletching Arrow shaft, shortbow, longbow fletching done via Interface. Arrow making (feather + shaft=headless arrow, headless arrow + arrowtip=arrow). Crossbow and bolt assembly. Bow stringing. [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img]Firemaking All logs have proper requirements to be lit. All logs can be burned. Colored lighters change fire color. All fires turn to ashes on correct timers. All players can see fires, and may cook food on them. Player walking in one direction after lighting a log (clipped). [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053740/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img]RuneCrafting Mage of Zamorak teleports players to Abyss. Every altar and portal works. Fully function small, medium and large sized pouches. Runecraft multiplier effect is perfect. Use Rune ess to make basic runes and Pure ess to make advanced runes. Every rune added besides Astral. [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img]Thieving Pickpocketing and stall thieving. Various items (fish,cakes) in correct stalls rather than coins. Npc’s may catch you stealing from them and attack you. Level affects how often you’re caught whilst stealing. [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043728/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img]Cooking Most cook-able foods configured to cook properly on a range or fire. Cooking level effects burn rate. Cooking gauntlets reduce burn rate. All cooking level requirements complete.[/center]
[u][b]Boss Area's:[/b][/u] Bandos Saradomin Armadyl Zamorak Nex KBD KQ Bork Tormented Demons Dagganoth Kings [u][b] [color=blue][size=24pt]Supporters List:[/u][/b] [size=18pt]Devenb123 RS2006 Hype Jitter Phat PVP im0wnag3[/size]
Pictures of server: [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/updated%20pics/welcomee.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/updated%20pics/home.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/updated%20pics/homeshops.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/updated%20pics/puro.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/updated%20pics/portal.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/updated%20pics/huntshop.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/updated%20pics/skills.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/Eclipse%20639/dungmin.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/shops/corp.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/shops/shop1.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/shops/shop2.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/shops/shop3.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/shops/shop4.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/Eclipse%20639/runeshop.png[/img] [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j344/eclipse663344/Eclipse%20639/nex.png[/img][/B][/CENTER]

Do you know any other coding languages? e.g. C++, Python, etc: C++

item.title: Eclipse 639 BETA - Now ECONOMY BASED!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Name: Ruby
Staff Account Name (If Accepted): Ruby
Coding Experience: 4 years HTML, 2 years PHP, CSS and MySQL
Position Applying For: Website Developer.
Tell me about yourself (RSPS Related): Well I’ve played RS for around 5 years now and I switched to RSPS about 3 years ago, in that time I’ve been around a lot of rsps as you can imagine. Probably the one i’m most famous for was Helix-World v1 v2 and v3, before pastor jack came and ruined it all. I was in-game mod on there for a while and then after Dan “helix” seen my work on websites he asked me to help him out with one and I made him a custom website fit to his needs and installed his vB, this was all short lived because “pastor jack” came and dumped the server from about 600 players to 200. But yeah, if you wanna see some of my recent work take a look here.
Do you know any other coding languages? e.g. C++, Python, etc: I know a small amount of java, but nothing spectacular.
Msn: not used msn in like 5 years so I can’t even remember it.
Skype: Ruby_Website_Developer
Email: ctaylor_bh1@yahoo.co.uk
Available Work Hours: All times in here are GMT.
Monday all day and after 10pm at night
Tuesday all day and night
Wednesday up until mid day then any time from 10pm
Thursday any time after 5pm
Friday after about 11pm
Saturday after about 11pm
Sunday all day and all night.

I hope you choose me!

Read full topic
